description: The true motives of creatures cannot escape your discerning gaze.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Detect alignment class feature, caster level 6th.

sections.text: When using your detect alignment class feature, you may spend 3 rounds studying a creature within 60 feet. You cannot take any other actions while doing this. After that time has passed, you learn the alignment of the creature.
sections.name: Benefits

name: Eyes of Judgment
